mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_users( username, password, email, name, role ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name}, #{role} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, name = #{name}, role = #{role}
